name: deeg
description: The night is darkest just before the dawn. And I promise you, the dawn is coming.

scripts.test: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul 'test/**/*.coffee' && istanbul report text-summary lcov
scripts.windowsTest: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul && istanbul report text-summary lcov
scripts.codecov: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul 'test/**/*.coffee' && istanbul report && codecov

author: SirSeim <sirseim@gmail.com>
